items/other/artifacts/alda_bronze_sword/: A rare artifact. Its intricate carvings and blue-green patina give this sword an otherworldly appearance.
items/other/artifacts/alda_clay_pot/desc: An uncommon artifact. Made from rich river clay, a faded pattern can still be seen. Once used by the Alda people to store food.
items/other/artifacts/alda_feather_penda: An uncommon artifact. Once used in marriage proposals, beautifully designed.
items/other/artifacts/alda_gem_bracelet/: A legendary artifact. Non-local gems suggest the Alda had trading partners across the sea.
items/other/artifacts/alda_mural_tablet/: A rare artifact. Depicts a scene of the Mistrian coast, as seen hundreds of years ago.
items/other/artifacts/aldarian_gauntlet/: A rare artifact. This battle-worn gauntlet shows heavy use.
items/other/artifacts/aldarian_sword/des: An uncommon artifact. A worn military sword, likely from the War of the Lilies.
items/other/artifacts/aldarian_war_banne: A rare artifact. Emblazoned with the royal crest of Aldaria.
items/other/artifacts/amber_trapped_inse: An uncommon artifact. It's noticeably bigger than today's insects.
items/other/artifacts/ancient_crystal_go: A rare artifact. Elegant and sturdy, this goblet was likely used during Witch Queen rituals.
items/other/artifacts/ancient_gold_coin/: An uncommon artifact. Etched with the outline of the Witch Queen on one side, and a magnificent tower on the other.
items/other/artifacts/ancient_horn_circl: A rare artifact. A horn circlet from the age of the Witch Queens. Was this a fashion accessory or did it serve a greater purpose?
items/other/artifacts/ancient_royal_scep: A legendary artifact. A Royal Scepter with the head of a dragon. The symbol of the Witch Queen's authority.
items/other/artifacts/ancient_stone_lant: An uncommon artifact. An impossibly delicate stone lantern from the age of the Witch Queens. It still retains an ethereal glow from within.
items/other/artifacts/black_tablet/descr: An uncommon artifact. Made of a strange metal, it's not clear what this is for.
items/other/artifacts/caldosian_breastpl: A rare artifact. This magnificent breastplate is so ornate, it was likely used for ceremonial purposes.
items/other/artifacts/caldosian_drinking: A rare artifact. Drinking horns were usually passed down through the family line.
items/other/artifacts/caldosian_emperor_: An uncommon artifact. The bust of a Caldosian Emperor. It's not clear which one.
items/other/artifacts/caldosian_sword/de: An uncommon artifact. An imperial officer's sword from the early days of the Caldosian Empire.
items/other/artifacts/coin_lump/descript: An uncommon artifact. A mass of old coins, fused together by time.
items/other/artifacts/completely_wrong_m: An uncommon artifact. A badly faded map that appears to show a landmass where the Western Bay now lies.
items/other/artifacts/criminal_confessio: An uncommon artifact. Too bad the pages are fused together.
items/other/artifacts/crystal_apple/desc: A rare artifact. Appears to have been infused with essence.
items/other/artifacts/diamond_backed_mir: A rare artifact. The use of diamond here feels impractical.
items/other/artifacts/dragon_claw/descri: An uncommon artifact. Extremely sharp, despite its age. It would make a fine blade, if it wasn't so heavy.
items/other/artifacts/dragon_forged_brac: A rare artifact. An ancient bracelet forged by dragon fire. Strangely, it looks like it would fit a human-sized wrist.
items/other/artifacts/dragon_pact_tablet: A legendary artifact. Written in untranslatable Draconian.
items/other/artifacts/dragon_scale/descr: An uncommon artifact. The passing of thousands of years has hardened this scale into something stronger than steel.
items/other/artifacts/family_crest_penda: An uncommon artifact. Once widely adopted in Aldaria, pendants were given to family members who were leaving home for the first time.
items/other/artifacts/flint_arrowhead/de: An uncommon artifact. Likely lost during a hunt.
items/other/artifacts/fossilized_egg/des: A rare artifact. What could be inside?
items/other/artifacts/fossilized_mandrak: A legendary artifact. Thankfully, it's fossilized.
items/other/artifacts/gathering_basket/d: An uncommon artifact. Still smells faintly of apples.
items/other/artifacts/giant_fish_scale/d: An uncommon artifact. Can't imagine what fish this came from.
items/other/artifacts/hardened_essence/d: A rare artifact. Magic essence hardened into a gem-like form. There must have been an enormous amount of magic in the world when this was formed.
items/other/artifacts/lost_crown_of_alda: A legendary artifact. Could this be the crown that was lost after the Caldosian Empire's invasion?
items/other/artifacts/mermaids_comb/desc: An uncommon artifact. Looks suspiciously like a fork.
items/other/artifacts/metal_leaf/descrip: A rare artifact. So detailed, it's not clear if it was grown or crafted.
items/other/artifacts/meteorite/descript: A legendary artifact. There's no telling how long ago it fell...
items/other/artifacts/muttering_cube/des: An uncommon artifact. This device emits a low hiss most of the time, and occasionally what sounds like voices from far away.
items/other/artifacts/obsidian_blade/des: A rare artifact. The artifact is still dangerously sharp.
items/other/artifacts/perfect_copper_ore: An uncommon artifact. This large chunk of pure copper ore is worthy of display.
items/other/artifacts/perfect_diamond/de: A rare artifact. This diamond is incredibly large and splendid.
items/other/artifacts/perfect_emerald/de: An uncommon artifact. An emerald of this clarity would gain nothing from being worked further.
items/other/artifacts/perfect_gold_ore/d: A rare artifact. This gold ore is incredibly large and splendid.
items/other/artifacts/perfect_iron_ore/d: An uncommon artifact. This chunk of iron is too magnificent to simply melt down.
items/other/artifacts/perfect_mistril_or: A rare artifact. This mistril ore is incredibly large and splendid.
items/other/artifacts/perfect_pink_diamo: A rare artifact. This pink diamond is incredibly large and splendid.
items/other/artifacts/perfect_ruby/descr: A rare artifact. This ruby is incredibly large and splendid.
items/other/artifacts/perfect_sapphire/d: A rare artifact. This unusually large sapphire seems to glow from within.
items/other/artifacts/perfect_silver_ore: An uncommon artifact. The size and sheen on this piece of silver is a work of art.
items/other/artifacts/petrified_wood/des: An uncommon artifact. Incredibly old and beautiful.
items/other/artifacts/rainbow_seaweed/de: An uncommon artifact. Can only be found floating in the current, no one seems to know where it grows.
items/other/artifacts/ritual_beads/descr: An uncommon artifact. Running these beads through your hand evokes a feeling of serenity.
items/other/artifacts/ritual_chalice/des: An uncommon artifact. This ornate chalice was presumably used during ancient rituals.
items/other/artifacts/ritual_incense_bur: An uncommon artifact. The faint scent of incense still clings to this ancient burner.
items/other/artifacts/ritual_scepter/des: A rare artifact. This ritual scepter was likely used by Dragon Priestesses during rituals.
items/other/artifacts/ritual_tablet/desc: A rare artifact. This tablet has a series of pictographs that show how to perform a ritual. It appears that one of the figures is a dragon.
items/other/artifacts/rock_with_a_hole/d: An uncommon artifact. Seems to be naturally formed.
items/other/artifacts/rubber_fish/descri: An uncommon artifact. How did this get in the water in the first place?
items/other/artifacts/rusted_shield/desc: An uncommon artifact. A very old shield with an unusual design.
items/other/artifacts/rusted_treasure_ch: An uncommon artifact. Looks quite valuable, a shame it can't be opened.
items/other/artifacts/shortcut_scroll/de: A legendary artifact. The scroll appears to show a quick and easy route to the bottom of the Mines, but you don't recognize any of the paths.
items/other/artifacts/statuette_of_calda: A legendary artifact. There seems to have been a subset of the empire that once worshiped Caldarus...
items/other/artifacts/stone_horse/descri: An uncommon artifact. Carefully carved and very cute.
items/other/artifacts/tiny_dinosaur_skel: A rare artifact. Definitely not just a lizard.
items/other/artifacts/trilobite_fossil/d: An uncommon artifact. Too many legs, but still kinda cute.
items/other/artifacts/unknown_dragon_sta: An uncommon artifact. This doesn't appear to be Caldarus.
items/other/artifacts/vintage_brush/desc: A rare artifact. This cute vintage tool was used to pet farm animals in years past.
items/other/artifacts/vintage_cow_bell/d: A legendary artifact. This vintage bell would have been used to call cows home in bygone years.
items/other/artifacts/vintage_hammer/des: An uncommon artifact. This vintage wooden hammer was used to break rocks before pickaxes were commonplace.
items/other/artifacts/vintage_sickle/des: An uncommon artifact. This vintage sickle was used by past generations to turn grass into fodder.
items/other/artifacts/vintage_watering_c: An uncommon artifact. This vintage watering can was popular among farmers back in the day.
items/other/artifacts/water_sphere/descr: An uncommon artifact. You're not sure why, but it won't pop.
items/other/artifacts/weightless_stone/d: An uncommon artifact. This black stone appears otherworldly in origin. It has no weight, and will roll around from the slightest breeze.
